|cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25LQ128EWIG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = DDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4A8G165WB-BCRC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;23.07+;; |stockos = Linux;6.1.54-10001;Debian 12; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.0 |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = USB (Type-C) Female |serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = HDMI 2.0, Micro SD Card slot, eMMC module socket, SPDIF, IR receiver, ADC header, I2C, SPI, GPIO, I2S |addchip = 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL852G;;1;,,, Microprocessor Supervisory Circuit;SGMicro;SGM809;;1;,,, 18V, 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Silergy;SY8120B;;4;,,, Single General-purpose Low-voltage Comparator;TI;LMV331;;1;,,, Ultra Low Dropout 500mA CMOS LDO;Will Semiconductor;WL2803E;;4;,,, Ultra Low Capacitance Transient Voltage Suppressor;TWGMC Electronics;AZ1345;;2; |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = root |manuf = Shenzhen Libre Technology |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 09/2023 |estprice = 35 |upc = 0647923366808 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0CHHJX44N |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''"Libre Computer Board
AML-S905X-CC-V2.0-C"'' is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Amlogic|List of Single-board computers}} ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Amlogic]] S905X @1.5GHz Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) *GPU: ''Mali-450'' @750MHz (OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 16MB (SPI NOR) Flash, eMMC module socket, :TF card (128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 2GB (DDR4) SDRAM ([[Samsung]]) *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet (100M) port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports, 1x USB 2.0 header *Power: 5V/3A via USB (Type-C), PoE header ==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2023/09/08/libre-computer-aml-s905x-cc-v2-sbc-directly-installs-linux-images-from-the-internet/ ''Libre Computer AML-S905X-CC-V2 SBC'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/libre-computer-showcases-low-cost-sbc-with-poe-support/ ''Libre Computer showcases low-cost SBC with PoE support'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] ==See also== ===Models=== :;[[Libre Computer]] • [[List of SBCs]] *[[Libre Computer Alta]] (AML-A311D-CC) • 4GB, GbE, USB 3.0, AI Accelerator *[[Libre Computer La Frite (1GB)]] (AML-S805X-AC) • 1GB/2GB, [[Amlogic]] S805X *[[Libre Computer Le Potato]] (2GB) (AML-S905X-CC) • 2GB, 64-bit, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Sweet Potato]] (2GB) (AML-S905X-CC-V2) • 2GB, 64-bit, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Renegade (1GB)]] (ROC-RK3328-CC) • 1GB/2GB, GbE, USB 3.0 *[[Libre Computer Renegade Elite]] (ROC-RK3399-PC) • 4GB, GbE, USB 3.0, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Solitude]] (AML-S905D3-CC) • 2GB/4GB, GbE, USB 3.0 *[[Libre Computer Tritium IoT]] (ALL-H3-CC IoT H2+) • 512MB, 32-bit *[[Libre Computer Tritium H3]] (ALL-H3-CC H3) • 1GB, 32-bit • [https://libre.computer/products/boards/all-h3-cc/ PPage] *[[Libre Computer Tritium H5]] (ALL-H3-CC H5) • 2GB, 64-bit [[Category:English Documentation]]
